column5: That looks like a fun way to catch'em. Great pics
Awesome. I'd be worried of the ski running into my leg and sticking some hooks in me when it thrashes.
Can't complain about a 47" er.    Congrats to ya.  Now ... go get a BIGGER one.

Yeah - we were both a little jumpy when she would change directions.... but all and all calm, cool and collected.  More nervous that the light gear wouldn't hold up....    HAHAHA  A bigger one... don't know if that will ever happy but you never know what is lurking in the shallows
Nice fish indeed! Congrats! Is it just me or does that fish look blind?
Looks blind to me at least in the one eye, nice fish though!
You can thank HDR for that.
